output.conclusion: This course has provided a foundational understanding of electrical engineering principles. Further exploration and practical application are encouraged to deepen your knowledge.
output.introduction: Welcome to the world of Electrical Engineering! This course will provide a beginner-friendly introduction to the fundamental concepts and principles that govern the field.

chapters.description: An overview of the field, its applications, and its impact on society.
Introduction to voltage, current, resistance, and power.
Understanding the standard units used in electrical engineering (Volts, Amps, Ohms, Watts).
Understanding the relationship between voltage, current, and resistance.
Analyzing circuits with components connected in series.
Analyzing circuits with components connected in parallel.
Types of resistors and their applications.
Types of capacitors and their applications.
Types of inductors and their applications.
Introduction to alternating current (AC) and its properties.
Introduction to direct current (DC) and its properties.
Comparing and contrasting AC and DC power.
Overview of semiconductor materials and their importance.
Introduction to diodes and their basic function.
Introduction to transistors and their basic function.
